thread.title: Fans Think Pink Will Be Pissed Lady Gaga Did Aerials During Her Super Bowl Halftime Show
thread.title_full: Fans Think Pink Will Be Pissed Lady Gaga Did Aerials During Her Super Bowl Halftime Show

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Fans Think Pink Will Be Pissed Lady Gaga Did Aerials During Her Super Bowl Halftime Show
text:
Lady Gaga totally slayed her halftime show at the Super Bowl on Sunday, and yet some fans couldn't help but notice her epic use of aerial acrobatics seemed to be very similar to another notable pop star.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below As multiple people have now pointed out, a few parts of Gaga's gorgeous performance were reminiscent of Pink's incredible performance at the Grammy's a couple years back. And since aerial acrobatics are kind of Pink's thing, many took to Twitter to point out the similarities and light-heartedly suggest that the singer was probably pretty pissed Gaga had one-upped her by jumping off the top of a football stadium.
Yo lady Gaga stole pink's whole acrobatic routine lmao
— #babythot (@TanishaTetrad) February 6, 2017 gaga made sure pink can never swing from anything ever again #SuperBowl #PepsiHalftime #LadyGaga pic.twitter.com/0kThzKhjn0
— William Vercetti (@dubvercetti) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "Take that, Pink!!"! - Lady Gaga
— Fortune Feimster (@fortunefunny) February 6, 2017
Lady Gaga flying on the ceiling Pink is so SHOOK her career is OVER
— corey (@corey4evrfamous) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
Lady Gaga: *checks phone*
"New message from P!nk!"
*swipes*
"Cash me outside howbow dah"
— Billy Jessica Parker (@TheRealBillyS) February 6, 2017
somewhere @pink is watching this half-time show like "bitch stole my cirque soleil shit"
— alex rees (@maybealexislost) February 6, 2017 Personally, I think there's plenty of room for both superstars to casually achieve magical feats mid-air. Also, I would totally pay to see their two-woman show.
Follow Gina on Twitter .
